explanation: [0-0] In the shot, against a red brick wall backdrop, there's an enclosure with a fence made of gray pipes. A man in a blue short-sleeved shirt, dark blue pants, wearing a black hat and mask, is standing outside the enclosure, facing it. Inside the enclosure, which is carpeted in green, a blonde woman in an orange jumpsuit stands with her hands bound by thick iron chains. Behind her is a long bench with a green cushion, a small red box placed on the left side of the cushion, and a black hammer in the space under the bench. A piece of paper covered in writing is stuck to the blue wall next to the bench.

[0-5] At first, the man extends his right hand, counting one, two, three with his fingers, then clenches both hands into fists and begins shaking his head and body from side to side. The woman stands still, watching him.
